description: Requests a sampling quota for rules that the service is using to sample requests.

parameters.name: SamplingStatisticsDocuments
parameters.description: Information about rules that the service is using to sample requests. (dict) --- Request sampling results for a single rule from a service. Results are for the last 10 seconds unless the service has been assigned a longer reporting interval after a previous call to GetSamplingTargets. RuleName (string) --- The name of the sampling rule. ClientID (string) --- A unique identifier for the service in hexadecimal. Timestamp (datetime) --- The current time. RequestCount (integer) --- The number of requests that matched the rule. SampledCount (integer) --- The number of requests recorded. BorrowCount (integer) --- The number of requests recorded with borrowed reservoir quota.

nested_items.name: SamplingTargetDocuments
nested_items.description: Updated rules that the service should use to sample requests.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the sampling rule.

nested_items.name: FixedRate
nested_items.description: The percentage of matching requests to instrument, after the reservoir is exhausted.

nested_items.name: ReservoirQuota
nested_items.description: The number of requests per second that X-Ray allocated for this service.

nested_items.name: Interval
nested_items.description: The number of seconds for the service to wait before getting sampling targets again.

nested_items.name: LastRuleModification
nested_items.description: The last time a user changed the sampling rule configuration. If the sampling rule configuration changed since the service last retrieved it, the service should call GetSamplingRules to get the latest version.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about SamplingStatisticsDocument that X-Ray could not process.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the sampling rule.
